items.title: Independence Requirements of Rule-Making Bodies for CPA's

visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning

items.headline: This course discusses the independence requirements of the principal rule-making bodies that public accountants may have
objectives_summary: Discover the importance of the requirement for CPA’s to preserve independence in order to perform audit and attest services.
"Identify the most common significant independence threats, and recognize how rules differ among various standard setting and regulatory bodies.
Explore how reporting entities and external accountants must work together to safeguard against threats to independence in both fact and in appearance.

items.headline: This course provides the tools to successfully select, purchase and implement your next accounting, ERP or CRM System.
